violations.help: Form elements should have a visible label

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Only title used to generate label for form element
nodes.html: <input type="search" class="et-search-field" placeholder="Search …" value="" name="s" title="Search for:">

none.message: Only title used to generate label for form element

violations.description: Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
  Form element does not have an explicit <label>
  Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty
nodes.html: <input id="email" name="email" placeholder="Enter Email (required)" label="Email" fieldtype="201" emailfield="1" type="email" required="required" maxlength="128">

any.message: aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
Form element does not have an explicit <label>
Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty

violations.description: Ensures every form element has a label

Save time by sending emails, text messages, and make phone calls using pre-built communication templates.
Build your brand and utilize social media using social posting and content discovery.
Get new appointments automatically by sharing your own personal appointment scheduler.
Organize your day and follow-up on time to get more appointments with inbuilt calendar and reminders.
Improve customer retention and loyalty by sending offers and coupons to your customers.
